entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow or rain changing to 60 percent chance of rain this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain or flurries this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
